title: Kyomu Senshi Miroku
synopsis: A psychic ninja fantasy suggesting that the assassins did not die out during the Sengoku era but burrowed under Japan, where they fought a new war against the alien occupants of a crashed spaceship that has lain undisturbed for several millennia.
characters: ['Jiraiya', 'Mochizuki, Rokurou', 'Yasha Hime', 'Kirigakure, Saizou', 'Nezu, Jinpachi', 'Hattori, Hanzou', 'Tokugawa, Ieyasu', 'Hangetsuzai']
voices: ['Hori, Hideyuki', 'Totani, Kouji', 'Kawamura, Maria', 'Hayami, Show', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto']
